lyrics.stanza: Fill all my vision, Savior, I pray, Let me see only Jesus today; Though through the valley Thou leadest me, Thy fadeless glory encompasseth me.
Fill all my vision, Savior divine, Till with Thy glory my spirit shall shine. Fill all my vision, that all may see Thy Holy Image reflected in me.
Fill all my vision, every desire Keep for Thy glory; my soul inspire With Thy perfection, Thy holy love, Flooding my pathway with light from above.
Fill all my vision, let naught of sin Shadow the brightness shining within. Let me see only Thy blessed face, Feasting my soul on Thy infinite grace.
